tree.title: Management Prescriptions for the West-side Cascades
tree.description: Select which activities you want to include in your forest management prescriptions.

branch.content: Management Style
branch.fork: 40-year rotation
60-year rotation
75-year rotation
Repeated thinning

branch.content: Would you like to include pre-commercial thinning in your 40-year rotation?
branch.fork: Yes
No

branch.content: Choose your species and retention targets
branch.fork: Douglas-fir monoculture with minimum retention at final harvest
Mixed-species with higher retention at final harvest
Douglas-fir and hemlock mix suitable for riparian zones
